name: Security for protection of public
text: [§271G-13]  Security for protection of public.  No certificate shall be issued to a water carrier or remain in force unless such carrier complies with such reasonable rules and regulations as the public utilities commission shall prescribe governing the filing and approval of surety bonds, policies of insurance, qualifications as a self-insurer, or other securities or agreements, in such reasonable amounts as the commission may require. [L 1974, c 94, pt of §1]
